subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson benefited from a Nascar ruling that cost Marcos Ambrose his first career Sprint Cup victory when he stalled his car under a late caution.
snippet: Jimmie Johnson benefited from a Nascar ruling that cost Marcos Ambrose his first career Sprint Cup victory when he stalled his car under a late caution.
